hints: quoting objects like "Manage Account" simplifies parsing and may reduce ambiguities.
Query entities containig many whitespaces must be quoted, e.g. "List all AppNames in Role "Assortment Specialist - Retail" .
when obtaining multiple ambigous results, use the "List all ... for ... " pattern or specify additional discriminating values
